forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers this afternoon following a period of morning rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a morning shower. Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a morning shower. Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 64F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High around 65F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 17C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 17C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 63F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 63F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
